# <code>{{ $frontmatter.title }}</code> for system

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.system }}</div>

## Signature

```> sys ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output |
| ------- | ------ |
| nothing | record |

## Examples

Show info about the system
```nu
> sys

```

Show the os system name with get
```nu
> (sys).host | get name

```

Show the os system name
```nu
> (sys).host.name

```
